QuestData.Title: Vicious Viziers
QuestData.Description: We're after Witch Lord Morkurk, but we shouldn't charge straight at him.$B$BHis three lieutenants - Vorgorsh, Zulmork, and Cromaug - are the only other capable mages left of the Gordunni, and are fiercely loyal to Morkurk.$B$BI suspect that if we engage the Witch Lord that they will rush to his aid. Let's take them out first.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Vizier Vorgorsh, Vizier Zulmork, and Vizier Cromaug.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that they're out of the way, Morkurk is exposed.
